name: Verify retrieving dishes with missing or incomplete endpoints
fullName: Dishes API Testing: Verify retrieving dishes with missing or incomplete endpoints
description:
As a user
  I want to validate filtering, retrieving dishes, and handling edge cases
  So that I can ensure the API handles diverse scenarios accurately.
descriptionHtml:
